subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C.C. Sabathia’s seven strong innings and three runs batted in from Mark Teixeira carried the Yankees to their seventh straight win and a two-and-a-half-game lead in the A.L. East.
snippet: C.C. Sabathia’s seven strong innings and three runs batted in from Mark Teixeira carried the Yankees to their seventh straight win and a two-and-a-half-game lead in the A.L. East.
